argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_fnmgp | |- mulGrp Fn _V |
| 2 |  | #P_ssv | |- Ring C_ _V |
| 3 |  | #P_fnssres | |- ( ( mulGrp Fn _V /\ Ring C_ _V ) -> ( mulGrp |` Ring ) Fn Ring ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( mulGrp |` Ring ) Fn Ring |
| 5 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( a e. Ring -> ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) ` a ) = ( mulGrp ` a ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` a ) = ( mulGrp ` a ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( a e. Ring -> ( mulGrp ` a ) e. Mnd ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( a e. Ring -> ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) ` a ) e. Mnd ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rgen | |- A. a e. Ring ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) ` a ) e. Mnd |
| 10 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) : Ring --> Mnd <-> ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) Fn Ring /\ A. a e. Ring ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) ` a ) e. Mnd ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 9, 10 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( mulGrp |` Ring ) : Ring --> Mnd |
